mapper.sql: id, user_id, value, creator, create_time, reviser, update_time, data_status
mapper.select: SELECT t_label_info.* FROM t_book_base_label_info, t_label_info WHERE book_base_id = #{id} AND t_book_base_label_info.data_status = "001" AND t_label_info.data_status = "001" AND t_label_info.id = t_book_base_label_info.label_info_id
mapper.delete: update t_label_info set data_status = "000",reviser = #{reviser} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:

id,
user_id,

update_time,
data_status,
create_time

mapper.update:

user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
value = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_label_info set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, value = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, reviser = #{reviser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, data_status = #{dataStatus,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
